## Stakeholder Analysis

### Key Stakeholder Groups

| Stakeholder Group | Interest Level | Influence Level | Communication Needs | Key Concerns |
|-------------------|----------------|-----------------|---------------------|--------------|
| Executive Sponsors | High | High | Strategic updates, decisions needed | ROI, timeline, risks |
| Project Team | High | Medium | Daily updates, task assignments | Clarity, priorities, blockers |
| End Users | Medium | Low | Feature updates, training | Usability, impact to workflows |
| External Partners | Medium | Medium | Milestones, dependencies | Timelines, integration points |

### Communication Channels

*Channels to be used for different types of communication.*

| Channel | Purpose | Audience | Owner |
|---------|---------|----------|-------|
| Email Updates | Weekly status, announcements | All stakeholders | Communications Lead |
| Project Dashboard | Real-time progress tracking | Project team, sponsors | Project Manager |
| Town Hall Meetings | Major milestone updates | Entire organization | Sponsor + PM |
| Slack/Teams | Day-to-day coordination | Project team | Execution Lead |
| Steering Committee | Strategic decisions, escalations | Executive sponsors | Project Manager |

---

## Communication Calendar

### Regular Communications

| Communication Type | Frequency | Audience | Owner | Channel | Template/Format |
|--------------------|-----------|----------|-------|---------|-----------------|
| Project Status Update | Weekly | Sponsors, stakeholders | PM | Email | Status report template |
| Team Standup | Daily | Project team | Execution Lead | Slack/in-person | 15-min sync |
| Stakeholder Review | Bi-weekly | Sponsors, key stakeholders | PM | Meeting | Demo + Q&A |
| Newsletter | Monthly | All stakeholders | Communications Lead | Email | Newsletter template |
| Executive Brief | Monthly | Executive sponsors | PM | Email/Meeting | 1-page summary |

### Milestone Communications

| Milestone | Target Date | Communication Event | Audience | Channel | Owner |
|-----------|-------------|---------------------|----------|---------|-------|
| Project Kickoff | | Kickoff meeting + announcement | All stakeholders | Meeting + Email | PM + Comm Lead |
| Design Complete | | Design review presentation | Sponsors, team | Meeting | Product Manager |
| Development Complete | | Demo + progress update | Stakeholders | Meeting + Email | Execution Lead |
| Testing Complete | | QA report + readiness review | Sponsors, team | Meeting | QA Lead |
| Go-Live | | Launch announcement | All stakeholders | Email + Town Hall | Sponsor + Comm Lead |
| Project Closure | | Retrospective + final report | Team, sponsors | Meeting + Email | PM |

---

## Change Communication Protocol

### When to Communicate Changes

- **Minor changes:** Documented in weekly status update
- **Moderate changes:** Dedicated email to affected stakeholders within 24 hours
- **Major changes:** Emergency meeting + formal announcement within 4 hours
- **Critical changes:** Immediate notification to sponsor + emergency stakeholder meeting

### Change Communication Template

**Subject:** [Project Name] - [Change Type] Change Notification

**What Changed:**

**Why This Change:**

**Impact:**
- Schedule:
- Scope:
- Budget:
- Resources:

**Next Steps:**

**Questions:** Contact [Change Manager Name]

---

## Risk and Issue Communication

### Escalation Thresholds

| Risk/Issue Level | Communication Action | Timeline | Audience | Owner |
|------------------|---------------------|----------|----------|-------|
| Low | Document in risk register | Next weekly update | PM only | Risk owner |
| Medium | Include in weekly status | Weekly update | Team, PM | Risk owner + PM |
| High | Dedicated email alert | Within 24 hours | Sponsors, key stakeholders | PM |
| Critical | Emergency notification | Within 2 hours | Sponsors, steering committee | PM + Sponsor |

---

## Communication Roles & Responsibilities

| Role | Communication Responsibilities |
|------|-------------------------------|
| **Communications Lead** | Develops communication plan; creates and distributes regular updates; manages communication channels; coordinates messaging |
| **Project Manager** | Provides project status and risk information; approves key messages; coordinates stakeholder meetings |
| **Sponsor** | Approves major announcements; delivers executive communications; participates in high-visibility events |
| **Change Manager** | Coordinates change-related communications; ensures consistent change messaging |
| **Execution Lead** | Provides technical updates; coordinates team communications; delivers demos |

---

## Communication Metrics

### Success Measures

*How will we measure the effectiveness of our communications?*

- **Stakeholder Satisfaction:** Target: >80% positive feedback on communication clarity
- **Response Rate:** Target: >70% acknowledgment of critical communications within 4 hours
- **Meeting Attendance:** Target: >85% attendance at stakeholder reviews
- **Information Accessibility:** Target: <2 hours to locate project information

### Feedback Mechanism

*How will we collect feedback on communication effectiveness?*

- Quarterly stakeholder survey
- Post-meeting pulse checks
- Open feedback channel (email/Slack)
- Retrospective sessions
